Authors:
Bo-Young Lee, Duck-Hyun Kim, Hui-Su Kim, Duck-Hyun Kim,
Heonghoon Han, Jae-Seong Lee
Title:
Identification of 74 cytochrome P450 genes and co-localized
cytochrome P450 genes of the CYP2K, CYP5A, and CYP46A families in the
mangrove killifish Kryptolebias marmoratus
Abstract:
Background: The mangrove killifish Kryptolebias marmoratus
is the only vertebrate that reproduces by self-fertilizing and is an
important model species in genetics and marine ecotoxicology. Using
whole-genome and transcriptome sequences, we identified all members of
the cytochrome P450 (CYP) family in this model teleost and compared them
with those of other teleosts.
